title: DragonBlade Riven (DB) Skin is Bugged
body: The skin feels really clunky. Sometimes I Q the wrong way and sometimes my eq combo doesn't work. I can't seem to auto attack cancel with q properly on this skin and I have no problem doing this with redeemed or arcade riven. I like the particle animations but the skin just doesnt feel right.

replies.body:
Heyu NUTTYN -

This is something we've investigated before, and it doesn't appear to be a bug, but rather, the difference in sound for her (Q), as opposed to other skins. This skin uses the same animation set as her other skins, so the animations shouldn't feel any different. 

Do you think the sound is throwing you off a bit?

Hey GLX Apollo - 

In the future, please [create a post on the Report A Bug boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) as opposed to tagging onto an existing report, as it helps us keep better track of issues. 

The first issue with the recall animation is intended. We recently added this so players who only played ARAM could still see their champ/skin's recall. 

Would you happen to have a repro for the fountain issue you're describing. Unfortunately, with the information you've provided, I don't have much to go off and I'm unable to reproduce this. 

I'd also need a bit more information about the jungle camp - a screenshot with the location would be greatly appreciated. 

If you would, please crate a new bug on the boards with these issues in it, and provide additional information. A new bug will be easier to communicate via, as well as keep all of this info in the right spot. 

Thanks!
Alright. Thanks for the info. I will try next chance I can to recreate this. Sorry for tagging onto a post as I just didn't know where to go to report these bugs.

Not a huge distance away, just like half a second after the shop icon dims out, walk back under the fountain again and you should be able to buy.
